definitions.definition: Of a direction relative to the subject, precisely; as if following a direct line.
examples: The door will be straight ahead of you.

definitions.definition: Directly; without pause , delay or detour .
examples: On arriving at work, he went straight to his office.
He claims he can hold his breath for three minutes straight .

definitions.definition: Of speech or information, without prevarication or holding back; directly; straightforwardly; plainly.

main_definition: Of a direction relative to the subject, precisely; as if following a direct line.
secondary_definitions: Directly; without pause , delay or detour .
Of speech or information, without prevarication or holding back; directly; straightforwardly; plainly.
